gorgonmod:SnakeSkin.NAME: Snake Skin
gorgonmod:SnakeSkin.DESCRIPTION: Reduce all your HP loss by 1.

gorgonmod:Deathstare.NAME: Deathstare
gorgonmod:Deathstare.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Gain !deathGaze! gorgonmod:Deathgaze.

gorgonmod:ScaleShrapnel.NAME: Scale Shrapnel
gorgonmod:ScaleShrapnel.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

gorgonmod:Snakebite.NAME: Snakebite
gorgonmod:Snakebite.DESCRIPTION: Activate the enemy's Poison. NL Deal !D! damage.

gorgonmod:Bloodcast.NAME: Bloodcast
gorgonmod:Bloodcast.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

gorgonmod:Triposte.NAME: Triposte
gorgonmod:Triposte.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

gorgonmod:Shocker.NAME: Shocker
gorgonmod:Shocker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

gorgonmod:Meditate.NAME: Meditate
gorgonmod:Meditate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

gorgonmod:DarkPresence.NAME: Dark Presence
gorgonmod:DarkPresence.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Gain !deathGaze! gorgonmod:Deathgaze.

gorgonmod:Concentrate.NAME: Fixation
gorgonmod:Concentrate.DESCRIPTION: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Gain !deathGaze! gorgonmod:Deathgaze.

gorgonmod:Blazeblast.NAME: Blazeblast
gorgonmod:Blazeblast.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

gorgonmod:Seduce.NAME: Seduce
gorgonmod:Seduce.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Enemy loses HP equal to its attacking intent.
gorgonmod:Seduce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their attacking intent.

gorgonmod:Tickle.NAME: Tickle
gorgonmod:Tickle.DESCRIPTION: Steal the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

gorgonmod:Bzzt.NAME: Bzzt
gorgonmod:Bzzt.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

gorgonmod:EyeBeam.NAME: Eye Beam
gorgonmod:EyeBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your gorgonmod:Deathgaze.

gorgonmod:SeenInHalf.NAME: Seen In Half
gorgonmod:SeenInHalf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has positive Strength, it loses its Strength this turn.

gorgonmod:Revolve.NAME: Revolve
gorgonmod:Revolve.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.

gorgonmod:LifeDrain.NAME: Life Drain
gorgonmod:LifeDrain.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !deathGaze! HP. NL Gain !M! Temporary_HP.

gorgonmod:Snakestance.NAME: Snake Stance
gorgonmod:Snakestance.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 2 Temporary_HP.

gorgonmod:Sightsing.NAME: Sightsing
gorgonmod:Sightsing.DESCRIPTION: Gain X gorgonmod:Deathgaze 3 times. Enemy loses X Strength this turn 3 times.
gorgonmod:Sightsing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 gorgonmod:Deathgaze 3 times. Enemy loses X+1 Strength this turn 3 times.

gorgonmod:StealingStare.NAME: Stealing Stare
gorgonmod:StealingStare.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Gain !M! Temporary_HP.

gorgonmod:Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
gorgonmod:Accelerate.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Gain [E]. NL Enemy gains 2 Strength.
gorgonmod:Accelerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Enemy gains 2 Strength.

gorgonmod:Postpone.NAME: Postpone
gorgonmod:Postpone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enemy gains 2 Strength.

gorgonmod:Constrain.NAME: Constrain
gorgonmod:Constrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy gains 2 Strength.

gorgonmod:Dualslash.NAME: Dualslash
gorgonmod:Dualslash.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Enemy loses !M! HP.

gorgonmod:Blunder.NAME: Blunder
gorgonmod:Blunder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain !M! Temporary_HP.

gorgonmod:AllomanticCircle.NAME: Allomantic Circle
gorgonmod:AllomanticCircle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP or Block this turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

gorgonmod:CursedPiercing.NAME: Cursed Piercing
gorgonmod:CursedPiercing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL In 2 turns, play a Cursed Piercing.

gorgonmod:Backslash.NAME: Backslash
gorgonmod:Backslash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Damage is also affected by enemy's Strength.

gorgonmod:Guarded.NAME: On Guard
gorgonmod:Guarded.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you lose HP this turn, gain !M! Block next turn.

gorgonmod:WaterLevel.NAME: Water Level
gorgonmod:WaterLevel.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to all enemies and increase this damage by 5.
gorgonmod:WaterLevel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to all enemies and increase this damage by 5.

gorgonmod:ForbiddenMagic.NAME: Forbidden Magic
gorgonmod:ForbiddenMagic.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

gorgonmod:MirrorShield.NAME: Mirror Shield
gorgonmod:MirrorShield.DESCRIPTION: Reflect Weak and Vulnerable this turn.

gorgonmod:ParalyzingStare.NAME: Paralyzing Stare
gorgonmod:ParalyzingStare.DESCRIPTION: Stun the enemy for 1 turn. NL Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat.
gorgonmod:ParalyzingStare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stun ALL enemies for 1 turn. NL Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat.

gorgonmod:Cliposte.NAME: Cliposte
gorgonmod:Cliposte.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

gorgonmod:PrestoCurse.NAME: Presto! Curse
gorgonmod:PrestoCurse.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP at the start of each of its turns.
gorgonmod:PrestoCurse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Enemy loses !M! HP at the start of each of its turns.

gorgonmod:MasterfulStab.NAME: Masterful Stab???
gorgonmod:MasterfulStab.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have exactly 2 cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have exactly 2 cardssss in my hand.

gorgonmod:Retaliation.NAME: Retaliation
gorgonmod:Retaliation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP or Block, gain !M! gorgonmod:Deathgaze.
gorgonmod:Retaliation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you lose HP or Block, gain !M! gorgonmod:Deathgaze.

gorgonmod:BubbleShield.NAME: Bubble Shield
gorgonmod:BubbleShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy has positive Strength, gain Block equal to their Strength.

gorgonmod:StoneOfThought.NAME: The Thonker
gorgonmod:StoneOfThought.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Whenever you draw this card, draw !M! cards.

gorgonmod:StoneOfDamage.NAME: Leaning Spire of Pisa
gorgonmod:StoneOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Whenever you draw this card, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

gorgonmod:StoneOfEnergy.NAME: Passion of the Cultist
gorgonmod:StoneOfEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Whenever you draw this card, gain [E] .
gorgonmod:StoneOfEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Whenever you draw this card, gain [E] [E] .

gorgonmod:StatueToss.NAME: Statue Toss
gorgonmod:StatueToss.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL !M! % chance: Stun the enemy for 1 turn.

gorgonmod:StoneOfFortitude.NAME: Statute of Libertations
gorgonmod:StoneOfFortitude.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Whenever you draw this card, gain !M! Temporary_HP.

gorgonmod:Mirrorshock.NAME: Mirror Shock
gorgonmod:Mirrorshock.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose !M! HP, gain [E] , and draw 1 card.

gorgonmod:Foresight.NAME: Foresight
gorgonmod:Foresight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.

gorgonmod:StatueShield.NAME: Statue Shield
gorgonmod:StatueShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a Leaning Spire of Pisa into your draw pile.
gorgonmod:StatueShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle an upgraded Leaning Spire of Pisa into your draw pile.

gorgonmod:LichForm.NAME: Lich Form
gorgonmod:LichForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain 12 Invincible. NL If you already have Invincible, lose 3 instead.

gorgonmod:Ceasefire.NAME: Ceasefire
gorgonmod:Ceasefire.DESCRIPTION: You and ALL enemies gain !M! Intangible.

gorgonmod:Lifecast.NAME: Lifecast
gorgonmod:Lifecast.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Whenever you lose HP this turn, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
gorgonmod:Lifecast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP this turn, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

gorgonmod:SlowDrain.NAME: Slow Drain
gorgonmod:SlowDrain.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses 1 Strength. NL Gain 1 Strength.
gorgonmod:SlowDrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Enemy loses 1 Strength. NL Gain 1 Strength.

gorgonmod:Amplify.NAME: Spiketime
gorgonmod:Amplify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL ALL enemies gain 1 Thorns.

gorgonmod:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
gorgonmod:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards, then discard your hand. NL If 9 cards were discarded this way, ALL enemies lose 50 HP.

gorgonmod:Entrap.NAME: Entrap
gorgonmod:Entrap.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Stun the enemy for 2 turns.

gorgonmod:StoneOfStun.NAME: Stunning Pose
gorgonmod:StoneOfStun.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Whenever you draw this card, Stun a random enemy for 1 turn.
gorgonmod:StoneOfStun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Whenever you draw this card, Stun ALL enemies for 1 turn.

gorgonmod:ReflectorShield.NAME: Reflector Shield
gorgonmod:ReflectorShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you lose HP or Block this turn, gain !M! gorgonmod:Deathgaze.

gorgonmod:Defreshment.NAME: Defreshment
gorgonmod:Defreshment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !deathGaze! gorgonmod:Deathgaze.

gorgonmod:StatueSmash.NAME: Statue Smash
gorgonmod:StatueSmash.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card at random. NL Draw !M! card. NL If there is a statue in combat, break it and prevent the next time you would lose HP.
gorgonmod:StatueSmash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card at random. NL Draw !M! cards. NL If there is a statue in combat, break it and prevent the next time you would lose HP.
